comments.content:
Looks like a learning cursive with rules, plain and dotted version. Sold by companies such as Educational Fontware, Inc. [http://educationalfontware.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724143832/http:/educationalfontware.com/ "http://educationalfontware.com/") If this company does not have this particular version, it's probably available from a competitor.  
Don
